name: XTrem FreeStyle
description:
If you don't have vertigo, you will really have some incredible Thrills!
You don't need to go further, you are on the right place!
"XTrem-FreeStyle" is made for You!

Don't be afraid, attach your helmet and take the handlebar of your XTrem Motorbike.
Many impressive acrobatics await you: BackFlip, Hart Attack, Shaolin, Cliffhanger, Rock Solid, Tsunami, Cordova... and more!

A "Tuto" mode is available in the Main Menu.
Follow the instructions and you'll be ready!

Go and look in the "Options" of the Main Menu to:

• Set the Accelerometer's Sensitivity or enable the Virtual-Pad to control your Motorbike.
• Select the Difficulty Level: "Beginner", "Expert" or "Pilot".
• Select the Camera: "Outside" or "Inside".
• Enable or Disable Music.
• Set the Graphic Quality.
• Enable or Disable Special Effects.

The time of all races is recorded.
You can share your Best Times on the Internet and see your rank in the International Ranking Table.

Are you going to dare...?

••• Game Features •••

• Drive incredible eXtreme Motorbikes!
• Impressive acrobatics!
• Thrills guaranteed!
• Full 3D Real Time Rendering!
• High Graphic and Animation Quality!
